scripts.auth:clear: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path='auth/user-auth.json';if(fs.existsSync(path)){fs.unlinkSync(path);console.log('✅ Cleared auth state');}else{console.log('⚠️ No auth state to clear');}"
scripts.setup:full: npm run auth:clear && npm run auth:email
